column4: I believe that it will work automatically if you have set Danish locales for your Ubuntu. At least this worked for me with German.
The problem is that locaes it set to english :) And not even the english spelling correcter works :/
So your problem is not routed in the locales but rather in OpenOffice.org. And is not Danish specific.
May be you can extract an error message and report it here in its full length.
